languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, мастер Херимон успешно совершил побег и прибыл на борт. Он почти закончил ритуал гармонизации с остальным хором — благодаря ему наши голоса звучат сильнее и цельнее".

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Master Herimon succeeded in his escape and has arrived on board. He has almost completed the ritual of harmonisation with the rest of the Choir, which has given our voices greater strength and cohesion."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, мастер Херимон успешно совершил побег и прибыл на борт. Он почти закончил ритуал гармонизации с остальным хором — благодаря ему наши голоса звучат сильнее и цельнее".

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Master Herimon succeeded in his escape and has arrived on board. He has almost completed the ritual of harmonisation with the rest of the Choir, which has given our voices greater strength and cohesion."

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, la fuga del maestro Herimon ha tenido éxito y ya está a bordo. Está completando el ritual de armonización con el resto del Coro, lo que ha otorgado a nuestras voces una mayor fuerza y cohesión».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Master Herimon succeeded in his escape and has arrived on board. He has almost completed the ritual of harmonisation with the rest of the Choir, which has given our voices greater strength and cohesion."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, la fuga del maestro Herimon ha tenido éxito y ya está a bordo. Está completando el ritual de armonización con el resto del Coro, lo que ha otorgado a nuestras voces una mayor fuerza y cohesión».

languages.text: 「陛下、マスター・ヘリモンが脱出に成功して、この船に到着しました。聖歌隊の他のメンバーとの調和の儀式は、ほとんど完了しており、私たちの声は強さと結束感がさらにアップしています」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Master Herimon succeeded in his escape and has arrived on board. He has almost completed the ritual of harmonisation with the rest of the Choir, which has given our voices greater strength and cohesion."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、マスター・ヘリモンが脱出に成功して、この船に到着しました。聖歌隊の他のメンバーとの調和の儀式は、ほとんど完了しており、私たちの声は強さと結束感がさらにアップしています」

languages.text: “大人，赫瑞蒙大师成功逃脱，人已经在船上了。目前，他已经差不多与唱诗班的其他成员完成了和声仪式。有了他的协助，我们的声音会变得更有力量、更加团结。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Master Herimon succeeded in his escape and has arrived on board. He has almost completed the ritual of harmonisation with the rest of the Choir, which has given our voices greater strength and cohesion."

traits.locale_text: “大人，赫瑞蒙大师成功逃脱，人已经在船上了。目前，他已经差不多与唱诗班的其他成员完成了和声仪式。有了他的协助，我们的声音会变得更有力量、更加团结。”

languages.text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, Meister Herimon ist erfolgreich entkommen und an Bord eingetroffen. Er hat das Ritual der Harmonisierung mit dem Rest des Chors bald abgeschlossen, was unseren Stimmen mehr Kraft und Zusammenhalt verleihen wird."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Master Herimon succeeded in his escape and has arrived on board. He has almost completed the ritual of harmonisation with the rest of the Choir, which has given our voices greater strength and cohesion."

traits.locale_text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, Meister Herimon ist erfolgreich entkommen und an Bord eingetroffen. Er hat das Ritual der Harmonisierung mit dem Rest des Chors bald abgeschlossen, was unseren Stimmen mehr Kraft und Zusammenhalt verleihen wird."

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, maître Herimon est parvenu à s'enfuir et est arrivé à bord. Il a presque achevé le rituel d'harmonisation avec le reste du chœur, ce qui a renforcé la cohésion et la force de nos voix. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Master Herimon succeeded in his escape and has arrived on board. He has almost completed the ritual of harmonisation with the rest of the Choir, which has given our voices greater strength and cohesion."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, maître Herimon est parvenu à s'enfuir et est arrivé à bord. Il a presque achevé le rituel d'harmonisation avec le reste du chœur, ce qui a renforcé la cohésion et la force de nos voix. »

languages.text: "Üstat Herimon, başarıyla kaçarak gemiye ulaştı {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Koro'nun geri kalanıyla birlikte seslerimize daha kudretli bir kuvvet ve uyum bahşedecek kaynaştırma ayini tamamlamak üzereydi."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Master Herimon succeeded in his escape and has arrived on board. He has almost completed the ritual of harmonisation with the rest of the Choir, which has given our voices greater strength and cohesion."
